CustomField.description: Applied the new pricing matrix in this formula. Please see LOP-136 for reference.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Application__r.Investor__r.Investor_Code__c =='CRB_THRM_PRIME') , IF(Term__c == 24, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0236, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0268, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0158, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 36, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0252, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0284, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0158, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 48, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0268, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0299, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0158, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 60, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0284, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0315, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0158, 0) ) ) ) ) , 0) ) ) ) , 0)
CustomField.label: Loan_Premium_Price_CRB_Theorem_Prime
